00011 #include <vector>
00012 #include <queue>
00013 #include "../common/utils.h"
00014 #include "../common/switch.h"

00020 
00021 
00022 
00023 class set_switch_handler
00024 {
00025   onoff_switch & switch_;
00026 public:
00027   set_switch_handler(onoff_switch & switch__):switch_(switch__) {}
00028         void operator() (request * req) { switch_.on(); }
00029 };
00030 
00035 template <typename block_type,typename bid_iterator_type>
00036 class block_prefetcher
00037 {
00038         block_prefetcher() {}
00039 protected:
00040         bid_iterator_type consume_seq_begin;
00041         bid_iterator_type consume_seq_end;
00042         unsigned seq_length;
00043         
00044         int * prefetch_seq;
00045                 
00046         unsigned nextread;
00047         unsigned nextconsume;
00048         
00049         const int nreadblocks;
00050                 
00051         block_type *read_buffers;
00052         request_ptr * read_reqs;
00053 
00054         onoff_switch * completed;
00055         int * pref_buffer;
00056         
00057         block_type * wait(int iblock)
00058         {       
00059                 START_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00060                 
00061                 #ifdef NO_OVERLAPPING
00062                 read_reqs[pref_buffer[iblock]]->poll();
00063                 #endif
00064                 
00065                 completed[iblock].wait_for_on();
00066                 END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00067                 int ibuffer = pref_buffer[iblock];
00068                 assert(ibuffer >= 0 && ibuffer < nreadblocks );
00069                 return (read_buffers + ibuffer); 
00070         }
00071 public:
00078         block_prefetcher(
00079                         bid_iterator_type _cons_begin, 
00080                         bid_iterator_type _cons_end,
00081                         int * _pref_seq,
00082                         int _prefetch_buf_size
00083                         ):
00084                 consume_seq_begin(_cons_begin),
00085                 consume_seq_end(_cons_end),
00086                 seq_length(_cons_end - _cons_begin),
00087                 prefetch_seq(_pref_seq),
00088                 nextread(_prefetch_buf_size),
00089                 nextconsume(0),
00090                 nreadblocks(nextread)
00091         {
00092                 int i;
00093                 read_buffers = new block_type[nreadblocks];
00094                 read_reqs = new request_ptr[nreadblocks];
00095                 pref_buffer = new int [seq_length];
00096                 
00097                 std::fill(pref_buffer,pref_buffer + seq_length,-1);
00098 
00099                 completed = new onoff_switch[seq_length];
00100                 
00101                 for (i = 0; i < nreadblocks; i++)
00102                 {
00103                         assert( prefetch_seq[i] < seq_length && prefetch_seq[i] >= 0 );
00104                         read_reqs[i] = read_buffers[i].read (
00105                                                                                 *(consume_seq_begin + prefetch_seq[i]),
00106                                                                                 set_switch_handler(*(completed + prefetch_seq[i])) );
00107                         pref_buffer[prefetch_seq[i]] = i;
00108                 }; 
00109         }
00112         block_type * pull_block()
00113         {
00114                 return wait(nextconsume++);
00115         }
00121         bool block_consumed(block_type * & buffer)
00122         {
00123                 int ibuffer = buffer - read_buffers;
00124                 read_reqs[ibuffer] = NULL;
00125                 
00126                 if (nextread < seq_length)
00127                 {
00128                         assert(ibuffer >=0 && ibuffer <nreadblocks);
00129                         int next_2_prefetch = prefetch_seq[nextread++];
00130                         
00131                         assert(next_2_prefetch <seq_length && next_2_prefetch >= 0 );
00132                         assert( !completed[next_2_prefetch].is_on() );
00133                         
00134                         pref_buffer[next_2_prefetch] = ibuffer;
00135                         read_reqs[ibuffer] = read_buffers[ibuffer].read(
00136                                                                 *(consume_seq_begin + next_2_prefetch),
00137                                                                 set_switch_handler(*(completed + next_2_prefetch))
00138                                                         );
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 if (nextconsume >= seq_length)
00142                         return false;
00143 
00144                 buffer = wait(nextconsume++);
00145 
00146                 return true;
00147         }
00149         ~block_prefetcher()
00150         {
00151                 delete [] completed;
00152                 delete [] pref_buffer;
00153                 delete [] read_buffers;
00154                 delete [] read_reqs;
00155         }
00156   
00157 };
00158
